solution: The Angle Bisector Theorem tells us that  \[\frac{AC}{AX}=\frac{BC}{BX}\]so \[AX=\frac{AC\cdot BX}{BC}=\frac{21\cdot28}{30}=\frac{7^2\cdot3\cdot4}{30}=\frac{7^2\cdot2}{5}=\boxed{\frac{98}5}.\]
